TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void WebPartDisplayModeEventHandler(object sender, WebPartDisplayModeEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed WebPartDisplayModeEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub WebPartDisplayModeEventHandler(sender As Object, e As WebPartDisplayModeEventArgs)
public delegate void WebPartDisplayModeEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, WebPartDisplayModeEventArgs ^ e);
type WebPartDisplayModeEventHandler = delegate of obj * WebPartDisplayModeEventArgs -> unit

span.span: A that contains the event data.

summary.span: 表示将处理 对象的 事件的方法。

span.span: Represents the method that will handle the event of a object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中指定的方法委托时将会调用引发事件。The method specified in the delegate will be called when a event is raised. 页面开发人员可以通过添加 Web 部件事件提供自定义处理程序`OnDisplayModeChanged`属性为``页上，并为属性指定自定义方法名称中的元素。Page developers can provide custom handlers for Web Part events by adding an `OnDisplayModeChanged` attribute to the `` element in a page, and assigning a custom method name to the attribute. 此外可以通过编程方式分配自定义处理程序。A custom handler can also be assigned programmatically. 有关以编程方式指定事件处理程序的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 如何： 将事件处理程序方法连接事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/348e9600-22e3-49a2-8864-11c5bb3e98fc)。For more information on programmatically assigning an event handler, see [NIB: How to: Connect Event Handler Methods to Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/348e9600-22e3-49a2-8864-11c5bb3e98fc).
